parameter.name: customer
parameter.description: The ID of an existing customer that will be charged in this request

parameter.name: receiptEmail
parameter.description: The email address to send this charge's receipt to

parameter.name: capture
parameter.description: The identifier of the capture to subscribe the customer to

parameter.name: statementDescriptor
parameter.description: An arbitrary string to be displayed alongside your company name on your customer's credit card statement

parameter.name: applicationFee
parameter.description: A fee in cents that will be applied to the charge and transferred to the application owner's Stripe account

parameter.name: cardNumber
parameter.description: The card number, as a string without any separators

parameter.name: shippingAddressPostalCode
parameter.description: postal code of the shipping address

parameter.name: trackingNumber
parameter.description: The tracking number for a physical product

parameter.name: carrier
parameter.description: The delivery service that shipped a physical product

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: A set of key/value pairs that you can attach to a customer object.
